content.html: it is hard to believe that the cncf would have u-turned on policy if people weren't so outspoken about it, so a lot of the calls for 'civility' might as well be saying "why can't you protest quietly" anyway, didn't expect the cncf to undermine their own coc to silence people
content.value:
it is hard to believe that the cncf would have u-turned on policy if people weren't so outspoken about it, so a lot of the calls for 'civility' might as well be saying "why can't you protest quietly"
 
anyway, didn't expect the cncf to undermine their own coc to silence people
